title: General Chemistry Laboratory for Majors
description: Condenses a year of introductory training in analytical, inorganic, physical, and synthetic techniques into one intensive quarter. Students may not receive credit for both CHEM 7L and CHEM 7LM. A materials fee is required. A safety exam must be passed. Enrollment preference given to chemistry and biochemistry majors, followed by other science/engineering majors. Prerequisites: CHEM 6B or 6BH. Restricted to the following major codes: CH25, CH31, CH34, CH35, CH36, CH37, CH38.
